response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations and contribute greatly to your success. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I understand its worth to you stands at $1,200,000. My proposal is to offer it to you at a price of $1,350,000, aiming to create a mutually beneficial transaction. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value and my objective to ensure a fair return on investment. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 1350000}
